schema.name: bbdn-lti2
schema.comment: This schema contains tables related to the LTI 2.0 Prototype B2.

table.name: bbdn_lti2_props
table.comment: This table stores the global settings for the LTI 2.0 Building Block

column.name: pk1
column.comment: This is the surrogate primary key for the table.

column.name: props_crs_ind
column.comment: Are tools enabled for courses

column.name: props_orgs_ind
column.comment: Are tools enabled for organizations

column.name: props_links
column.comment: Tool Provider link creation permissions: 0=allow any link not excluded, 1=allow any link, but require approval, 2=only allow approved links

column.name: props_postgrades_ind
column.comment: Allow configured tool providers to post grades.

column.name: props_getgrades_ind
column.comment: Allow configured tool providers to get grades.

column.name: props_toolcfg_ind
column.comment: Allow configured tool providers to put tool settings.

column.name: props_senddata
column.comment: Default Value for User Data send permissions: 0=never, 1=SSL only, 2=any connection

column.name: props_sendrole_ind
column.comment: Default value for Send Role

column.name: props_sendname_ind
column.comment: Default value for Send User name

column.name: props_sendemail_ind
column.comment: Default value for send email address

column.name: props_userack_ind
column.comment: notify user that they are leaving Blackboard?

column.name: props_ackmsg
column.comment: message to notify user that they are leaving Blackboard

primary-key.name: bbdn_lti2_props_pk
primary-key.comment: This is the name of primary key constraint on column settings_id.

table.name: bbdn_lti2_tools
table.comment: This table contains the settings for each individual tool provider domain

column.name: pk1
column.comment: This is the surrogate primary key for the table.

column.name: tool_domain
column.comment: Base domain for tool provider

column.name: tool_status_ind
column.comment: If Y, the tool is approved, if N, the tool is excluded

column.name: tool_sechost
column.comment: List of secondary hostnames, delimited by |

column.name: tool_global_ind
column.comment: If Y, settings for tool affect all links. If N, each link is responsible for its own configuration

column.name: tool_key
column.comment: The tool provider key. This is provided by the Tool Provider in LTI 2.0

column.name: tool_secret
column.comment: The tool provider shared secret. This is provided by the Tool Provider in LTI 2.0

column.name: tool_customparams
column.comment: Name-Value pairs delimited by | to be sent by Blackboard to the Tool Provider

column.name: tool_postgrades_ind
column.comment: Allow configured tool providers to post grades.

column.name: tool_getgrades_ind
column.comment: Allow tool provider to get grades.

column.name: tool_toolcfg_ind
column.comment: Allow tool provider to put tool settings.

column.name: tool_senddata
column.comment: Default Value for User Data send permissions: 0=never, 1=SSL only, 2=any connection

column.name: tool_sendrole_ind
column.comment: Default value for Send Role

column.name: tool_sendname_ind
column.comment: Default value for Send User name

column.name: tool_sendemail_ind
column.comment: Default value for send email address

column.name: tool_userack_ind
column.comment: notify user that they are leaving Blackboard?

column.name: tool_ackmsg
column.comment: message to notify user that they are leaving Blackboard

primary-key.name: bbdn_lti2_tools_pk
primary-key.comment: This is the name of primary key constraint on column tool_id.

table.name: bbdn_lti2_links
table.comment: This table contains all of the LTI2 links

column.name: pk1
column.comment: This is the surrogate primary key for the table.

column.name: link_title
column.comment: Link Title

column.name: link_url
column.comment: LTI Launch URL

column.name: link_key
column.comment: Key, if set at the link level

column.name: link_secret
column.comment: Secret, if set at the link level

column.name: link_customparams
column.comment: Name-Value pairs delimited by | to be sent by Blackboard to the Tool Provider

column.name: link_tool_id
column.comment: reference to the domain provider entry in the tools table.

column.name: link_content_id
column.comment: Reference to the content table in Learn for links entered as content items.

primary-key.name: bbdn_lti2_links_pk
primary-key.comment: This is the name of primary key constraint on column bbdn_link_id

foreign-key.name: bbdn_lti2_links_fk1
foreign-key.comment: This is a foreign key referencing a primary key in the lti2 tools table, referential action cascade on delete (cascade) - all relevant entries will be deleted if the domain provider entry is deleted.

foreign-key.name: bbdn_lti2_links_fk2
foreign-key.comment: This is a foreign key referencing a primary key in the standard Blackboard COURSE_CONTENTS table, referential action cascade on delete (cascade) - all relevant entries will be deleted if the content item is deleted from the course.

sql-script.name: insert_default_values.sql
sql-script.comment: Populate global settings with secure defaults if not currently populated with data.
